Erminia, tiene 38 años de edad, vive con sus 5 hijos, de 12, 14, 16, 18 y 20 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración y comercialización de loza (ollas, comales, sartenes), junto a sus dos hijos mayores, trabajan diariamente, Erminia aprendió desde muy joven y le enseño a sus hijos, para que le ayudaran y pudiera aumentar la producción, ellos elaboran lo comales y ollas de barro, los queman en horno y utilizan otros materiales para dar por finalizado el proceso.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña ($100), barro ($50), nacazcol ($25), mano de obra, transporte y otros gastos, haciendo la suma de este préstamo, esta inversión será de gran ayuda para tener la suficiente materia prima y continuar en la elaboración de artesanía.
La aspiración de Erminia es poder ayudar a que sus hijos se superen estudiando, ya que cuando ella creció sus padres eran pobres y no le ayudaron para que se superara, ella por lo mismo quiere que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Erminia is 38 years old and lives with her 5 children, ages 12, 14, 16, 18 and 20. She is dedicated to the development and commercialization of earthenware (pots, griddles, pans). She works daily with her two older children.  Erminia learned the skill at a young age and taught it to her children so they could help her and to increase production.  They make the griddles and pots of clay, burn them in the oven, and then use other materials to finalize the process.  

She is currently seeking a loan for the purchase of wood ($100), clay ($50), nacazcol dye ($25), labor, transportation and other expenses, make up the total sum of the loan. This investment will be a big help in order to have sufficient primary materials and to continue the making of the earthenware handicrafts.

Erminia's aspiration is to help her children complete their studies.  When she was growing up her parents were too poor to help her complete her studies, so she wants her children to have a better future than she did.

loans.use: to purchase wood, clay, nacazcol dye, labor and transportation

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y siembra de granos básicos, vive con su familia, su esposa y cinco hijos,  de los cuales tres dependen económicamente de él, lleva 15 años en el negocio, lo heredo de sus padres, es una labor muy bonita trabajar en el campo, pues Martin así la considera.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de concentrado para el ganado, ya que en época de verano el zacate se seca y debe estar preparado con harinilla y concentrado para alimentarlos, este préstamo le ayudara para tener lo necesario y poder alimentar al ganado.
La aspiración de Martin es desarrollarse como ganadero, teniendo buena calidad de animales en sus terrenos, que sea rentable, que le permita darle un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Martín works raising cattle and growing basic grains.  He lives with his family, his wife and five children, three of whom are financially dependent on him.  He has had the business for 15 years.  He inherited it from his parents.  It is a very nice job, working in the fields; at least Martín considers it to be so.

He is requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed for his cattle because in the summer the grass dries up and he needs to be prepared with middling grain and concentrated feed to feed them.  This loan will help him be able to have what is necessary and be able to feed the cattle.

Martín's goal is to develop as a cattleman, having good-quality animals on his land and being profitable, which would allow him to give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for the cattle.

loans.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Esperanza” está conformado por 18 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran venta de ropa, atención de un ciber (local publico con acceso a internet), librería, preparación de comida rápida, pastelería, costuras de ropa, entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Chillán.
Maribel integrante del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en la primera fila, ubicada en el primer puesto de izquierda a derecha, su cabello es de color castaño oscuro y viste con pantalones color café. 
Ella se dedica a atender un almacén de abarrotes y bebidas. Comenta que tiene éste negocio desde hace 5 meses. Su horario de atención es en horario completo, ya que trabaja de 8ºº de la mañana hasta las 10ºº horas de la noche, de lunes a domingo. Debe seguir éste horario debido a que no existe otro almacén a 3 kilómetros y la demanda de clientes es alta. Situación que observa con optimismo, ya que no tiene competencias.
Actualmente también ha incorporado la preparación y venta de pan.
Su mercadería la compra en supermercados mayoristas y distribuidoras de confites.
Con el crédito comprará una vitrina congeladora eléctrica, para guardar sus productos, de ésta manera pretende aumentar su clientela y por ende sus ingresos.
Sus metas son ampliar su local para comenzar con el inicio de actividades, ya que por ahora solo cuenta con un permiso de ventas provisorio. Además comprar una amasadora para facilitar la preparación de pan. 
Maribel vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 6 y 1 año siete meses de edad. Su marido es quien la ayuda con la administración del negocio, durante la semana y también la apoya con el cuidado de sus hijos. 
Sus sueños a nivel personal son obtener su casa propia, ya que por ahora le cedieron un terreno y casa prestados. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida del apoyo económico brindado por Fondo esperanza, además se siente muy cómoda con las reuniones impartidas, ya que comparte experiencias con otros socios comerciantes y también aprende nuevas estrategias de administración.
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Esperanza” and it has 18 entrepreneurs who carry out a variety of lines of work among which are clothes sales, running an Internet café (a public place with access to the Internet), bookstore, fast food production, pastry shop and clothes making, among others; all are from the city of Chillán.

Maribel is a member of the communal bank who is seated in the first row in the photo first from left to right; her hair is dark brown and she’s wearing brown pants.  She runs a grocery and beverage shop.  She comments that she’s had this business for the last five months.  She works full time since she works from 8am until 10pm, Monday to Sunday.  She must follow this schedule because there is no other store for 3 kilometers and customer demand is high, a situation she notes optimistically because she has no competition.  She has recently also added baking and selling bread.  She buys her merchandise in wholesale supermarkets and from snack distributors.

She will use the loan to buy an electric, refrigerated display case to store her products to increase clientele and thus her income.  Her goals are to expand her store to start her activities cycle since she now only has a temporary sales permit.  She will also buy a kneader to make bread making easier.

Maribel lives with her husband and two children who are 6 years and one year and seven months old.  Her dream at a personal level is to obtain a house of her own since she currently lives in a borrowed house and lot.  

She is very happy and grateful for the economic support Fondo Esperanza has granted her.  Besides, she feels very comfortable in the meetings they have because she shares experiences with other merchant members and also learns new administration strategies.

Chillán is a commune in south-central Chile.  Its name means “Seat of the Sun” in Mapudungun, the language of the Mapuche indigenous peoples.  Chillán is also known as the “Birthplace of the Nation” or “Land of Artists” because outstanding personages in Chile’s history were born here like the well-known pianist, Claudio Arrau, for example.

loans.use: to buy an electric, refrigerated display case.

loans.name: Uchi

texts.en: Uchi is married but does not have any children yet. She is pictured with her husband. She has been doing her business servicing electronic goods since 2005. She has her own kiosk to receive orders for repairing electronic goods. Now her business is running slow, because she does not have enough money to buy new machine to use to repair electronics. Now she is taking out a loan with VisionFund Indonesia to buy a wire dynamo spindle machine. In the future she wants to complete her machine so that she can receive more orders. Also, she wants to repair her house and hopes she can have a child.

loans.use: to pay for a wire dynamo spindle machine

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama  produces  fanti kenkey for sale at Nyame Bekyere near Abura. She is a single parent and has 8 dependents. Ama has been selling sells fanti kenkey (fermented corn dough wrapped in corn or banana leaves)  for 10 years now. She uses her income to pay the children's school fees. Her loan will be used to purchase bags of maize for the production of her kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize for the production of her kenkey for sale.

loans.name: Ayishetu

texts.en: Ayishetu is single and sells sugar and rice at Nyame Bekyere near Abura. She has been in this business for 2 years now. Ayishetu uses her income to pay her utility and accomodation bills. She needs this loan to purchase bags of rice and sugar to sell. With the new profit, Ayishetu will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Darkin Joel

texts.es:
Darkin Joel es un joven de 27 años de edad, soltero, reside en barrio el Triangulo en el municipio de San Francisco de la Paz y se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano.

Darkin inició a vender ropa de segunda mano en el año 2005 y lo hacia de forma ambulante, recorria las calles de su comunidad, aldeas y cacerios mas cercanos. Pero gracias al bueno manejo de los ingresos de su negocio pudo obtener financiamientos y construir una pequeña pieza en su casa de habitacion, y ahora tiene su propio local. Su horario de atencion es de lunes a sabado de 8:00 am a 5:00 pm. La ventaja de su negocio es que obtiene muy buena ganancia pero tambien tiene mucha competencia y ultimamente las ventas han bajado.

El prestamo que solicita Darkin lo necesita para comprar varios fardos de ropa usada y asi podra surtir de su negocio de varios estilos especialmente para la temporada de verano. 

Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio hasta convertirlo en una tienda y seguir apoyando a su madre con su sostenimiento, ya que ella esta en una edad avanzada y aun trabaja hornando pan y lo vende ambulantemente.

Darkin tiene mas de cinco ciclos en FAMA y con los prestamos obtenidos a podido mantenerse economicamente activo. Y su comportamiento de pago ha sido puntual.
texts.en:
Darkin Joel, 27, is a young, single man living in the El Triángulo neighborhood in the municipality of San Francisco de la Paz; he sells second-hand clothes.  He started selling used clothes in 2005 and did it in an ambulatory fashion throughout the streets in his community and in the nearest villages and hamlets.  But thanks to the good way he’s managed his income from the business he was able to obtain financing and build a small room in his house so that now he has his own locale.  His hours of operation are Monday through Saturday from 8am until 5pm.  The advantage of his business is that it earns good profits but he also has a lot of competition and his sales have decreased recently.

The loan that Darkin is asking for will be used to buy several bundles of used clothes to stock his store with assorted styles, especially for the summer season.  His goal is to make his business grow turning it into a store to continue helping to support his mother since she’s of an advanced age but still works baking bread to sell in an ambulatory way.

Darkin has more than five cycles with FAMA and has used previous loans to stay economically active.  His repayment behavior has been punctual.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing.

location.town: San Francisco de la Paz, Olancho

loans.name: Alberto Isaias

texts.es:
El señor Alberto Isaias es casado, tiene 32 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 1 hijos y esta estudiando, se dedica al corte de cabello, inicio este trabajo siendo operario, y hasta el momento lleva 12 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien es amas de casa.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de maquinas ya que quiere mejorar sus servicios con esta maquinas, y mejorar sus ganancias, espera en  el futuro tener una capital mejor.
texts.en: Alberto Isaías, 32, completed the six years of elementary school.  He has one child who is attending school.  He cuts hair.  He started this work as an employee and to date has 12 years' experience.  His wife, who is a housewife, helps him out.  He's asking for a loan to buy hair cutting machines because he wants to improve service with these machines and imrpove his porofits.  He hopes in future to have better capital.

loans.use: to buy hair cutting tools.

loans.name: Tambah Cair Group

texts.en:
Lely is 27 years old and married with two children. She lives together with her husband and children in a simple house in Jati Rahayu. She has been selling "nasi uduk" (an Indonesian rice dish) for two years. She sells it in front of her house. At first the business was not going so well because of the lack of capital, and that’s why she is taking her first loan with VisionFund Indonesia so that she can run her business well.

This loan will help her to buy more supplies such as rice and flour and add more varieties of foods to sell. Because of this business she can help her husband pay expenses for their family and for their two young children's education. In the future she wants to expand her business and have her own kiosk. Other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as selling snacks and selling vegetables.

loans.use: to buy more supplies such as rice and flour

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy drinks, food products and other basic household items to sell

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. He is married and has a welding business. This business has been in operation for the last ten years. He started the business from funds obtained from his friends.

James was introduced to Milango by his friends and is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to purchase additional welding materials. Challenges facing the current business include the overall rate of inflation and some customers not paying on time. 

James looks forward to opening other branches dealing in welding and will save the additional income from this loan for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to purchase additional welding materials.

loans.name: Jason

texts.en:
Jason is 51 years old, married to Cicilia, and blessed to have seven children that he supports.

For the last two years, he has been operating a hardware retail business. His monthly income is approximately 15,000 KES.

He has applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 KES, which would be his first loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the loan proceeds to buy more stocks of tea leaves, sugar, and wheat flour for re-sale purposes. The anticipated profits will be reinvested in the business. In the future he dreams of expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory (e.g., tea leaves, sugar, and wheat flour) for re-sale purposes.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco, vive con su esposa y 5 hijos, está dedicado a la agricultura y crianza de cerdos, él posee terreno propio para cultivar maíz y frijol, inicia todas las mañanas sus labores en el campo y atendiendo la granja de cerdos.
Actualmente Francisco solicita un préstamo para la compra de herbicidas y pago de mano de obra para limpiar tres manzanas de terreno, donde iniciara el cultivo, este préstamo le ayudara a tener preparado el lugar, libre de malezas, para que luego inicie la siembra.
La aspiración de Francisco es que con la aplicación de los materiales y la utilización de este préstamo pueda mejorar las cosechas, para la alimentación familiar y poder vender.
texts.en: Francisco lives with his wife and five children.  He’s a farmer and raises pigs.  He owns a field to grow corn and beans.  He does his field work and tends to the pigs every morning.  He is asking for a loan at present to buy herbicide and to pay labor costs to clear three manzanas [Central American unit of land measurement] to start his planting.  This loan will help him have the site ready, free of weeds, to start his planting later.  Francisco’s hope is that by applying the materials and using this loan he will be able to improve his crop yields both to feed his family and to be able to sell.

loans.use: to buy herbicide and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Wagner Joselito

texts.es: El Joven Wagner es soltero, tiene 27  años de edad, Wagner   estudia Teología   en una universidad privada de prestigio, Wagner escogió esta carrera ya que es su vocación y tiene las capacidades y habilidades para desarrollarse profesionalmente, actualmente Wagner trabaja de administrador en un colegio,  con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para pagar su matrícula y la primera cuota de su mensualidad, Wagner  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran
texts.en: Wagner, 27, is single and is studying Theology at a prestigious private university.  Wagner chose this career because it’s his vocation and he has the capacity and ability to develop professionally.  Wagner currently works as a school administrator.  Aiming at continuing to grow, he’s decided to request a new loan to pay registration fees and his first monthly tuition payment.  Wagner will reach his goals with much work and effort and Edaprospo loans will help him.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
Mariama is a single woman.

To earn a livng, she works as a petty trader. Specifically, she trades in rice and groundnuts at Nyame Bekyere near Abura. In front of Mariama in the picture are small bags of rice that she sells to her customers. She explains that she has been selling rice and groundnuts for two years. She uses income she generates from her business to pay for her living expenses, including utility bills.

Mariama is seeking this loan to purchase bags of rice and groundnuts to re-sell to her customers. With the anticipated profits to be generated as a result of the loan, Mariama would like to aquire a large quantity of rice to distribute to retailers.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of rice and groundnuts for re-sale purposes

loans.name: Lidia Ortencia

texts.es:
Lidia, se dedica a la venta de ropa y además una pequeña tienda de productos domésticos, vive con su esposo y un hijo junto a su esposa, por las mañanas sale a vender al mercado y la esposa del hijo le atiende el negocio en la casa, se apoyan para tratar de salir adelante.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva, vestidos, faldas cortas y largas, ropa interior, blusas, esto le ayudara para mantener surtido el negocio y poder mejorar las ventas.
La aspiración de Lidia es desarrollarse como comerciante, para establece un mejor negocio y solventar de una mejor manera sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Lidia sells clothes and also has a domestic products store.  She lives with her husband, son and her son’s wife.  In the morning she goes out to sell in the market and her son’s wife tends to the business at home; they help each other get ahead.

She requested the loan to buy new clothes: dresses, short and long skirts, underwear and blouses.  This will help her keep the store stocked and to improve sales.  

Lidia’s hope is to develop as a merchant to establish a better business and meet her needs in a better way.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la confección de bolsones y carteras, elaboradas a base de hilo y cáñamo, ella vive con su esposo, una hija y dos nietos, ella trabaja en la artesanía desde hace siete años, tambien se dedica a la sastrería, confeccionando trajes y todo tipo de prendas de vestir que le encarguen sus clientes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de coser, ya que esta nueva herramienta le servirá para agilizar su trabajo.
María considera que a través de este préstamo, lograra integrar esta nueva herramienta, creciendo con el negocio y ayudando a su familia con más ingreso.
texts.en:
María makes tote bags and purses out of thread and hemp.  She lives with her husband, a daughter and two grandchildren.  She’s worked making crafts for seven years and is also a tailor making suits and all sorts of articles of clothing her customers order from her.

She’s asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine because this new work tool will help her do her work more efficiently.  María believes that through this loan she will be able to integrate this new tool growing in business and helping her family with more income.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Isabel Velinda

texts.es:
Isabel, es madre soltera, tiene una hija de 21 años de edad y una nieta de 3 años, las dos dependen de ella, Isabel se dedica a la venta de tortillas y una librería pequeña, la venta la realiza todos los días de la semana, tiene una buena ubicación lo que le permite tener mejores ventas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 7 quintales de maíz y gas propano, este préstamo le dará mejor disponibilidad de materiales, para aumentar la producción.
La aspiración de Isabel es que su negocio sea rentable, ganas más clientes, y colaborar con su hija en los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Isabel is a single mother; she has a 21 year old daughter and a three year old granddaughter; both depend on her.  Isabel sells tortillas and has a small stationery shop.  Sales take place every day of the week.  Her location is good which leads to better sales.

She’s asking for a loan to buy 7 quintals of corn and propane gas.  This loan will give her better accessibility to materials in order to increase production.

Isabel’s hope is that her business will be profitable, to acquire more customers and to help her daughter with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy 7 quintals of corn and propane gas.

loans.name: Anita Lucía

texts.es:
Anita es una mujer de 35 años, que a corta edad se casó y tuvo tres hijos (de 15, 12 y 10 años), junto a ellos y a su esposo Hugo (quien es empleado público) viven en "Los Bancos", que es un cantón rural de la Provincia de Pichincha, donde se encuentra la capital del Ecuador. Uno de los principales recursos de "Los Bancos" es el hídrico ya que  en su territorio se originan un sin número de riachuelos y pequeñas vertientes que dan paso a ríos de considerable tamaño. Este cantón tiene un gran movimiento comercial que se desenvuelve en la calle principal, donde se encuentran hoteles, restaurantes y almacenes, sobre todo de productos agropecuarios, así como servicios veterinarios y tiendas para el consumo diario de la población. 

Esta mujer se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y posterior venta, su tiempo libre lo dedica a su hogar y a sus hijos. Desea obtener un crédito para comprar cerdos y de esta manera incrementar sus ingresos. Es su cuarto crédito y en los anteriores se destacó por sus pagos puntuales. Anita se dedica a este oficio desde hace 7 años y lo empezó por iniciativa propia, para así poder aportar a la economía familiar. 

El objetivo de Anita ha sido la estabilidad de su hogar, no solamente en la parte económica sino de valores familiares. Esperamos que ella pueda incrementar su negocio y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida con mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Anita is a 35-year-old woman who married at a young age and had three children, who are now 15, 12 and 10.  She lives with her children and her husband Hugo, a public employee, in Los Bancos, a rural county in the province of Pichincha where the capital of Ecuador is located.  One of the main resources of Los Bancos is water because it is the origin of a number of creeks and small streams that lead to rivers of considerable size.  This county is heavily commercial.  Hotels, restaurants and stores, many of which are agricultural in nature, are located on the main street, as well as veterinary businesses and stores that the local population frequents daily.

Anita works raising and selling pigs.  Her free time is spent taking care of her house and kids.  She wants a loan to buy more pigs and increase her income.  This is her fourth loan, and her prior loans were repaid very punctually.  Anita has been in this business for seven years and began on her own initiative in order to contribute to household expenses.

Anita's objective is to promote a stable environment for her family, not only economically but also in terms of family values.  She will hopefully be able to grow her business and attain a higher standard of living with additional income.

loans.use: to buy pigs for breeding and sale.

loans.name: Angelica Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Angelica Isabel es casada, tiene 22 años de edad, cursó el tercer años de educación básica, tiene 1 hijos, se dedica a la elaboración de calzado o zapatos, inicio este negocio juntos con su esposo y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien hace el mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de cuero y suelas, para que de esa forma mejore su producción de zapatos, espera en le futuro tener un capital amplio.
texts.en:
Angelica Isabel is 22 years old, married, and has 1 child.  She has 3 years of basic schooling.  Angelica Isabel makes a living making shoes.  She started this business with her husband and now has 3 years of experience.  She has support from her husband, who does the same type of work as she does.

Angelica Isabel will use the loan to purchase leather and soles so she can improve her shoe production.  She hopes to increase her capital in the future.

loans.use: to purchase leather and soles for making shoes.

loans.name: Palem Jaya Group

texts.en:
Sri is 45 years old and married with three children who are still attending school. Her children are the most important things in her life and so she works hard every day in order to provide them with everything they need. Her husband works as a taxi driver but he also supports her a lot and they are very close. 

Sri has a business selling cookies and snacks that she started five years ago. She believes that her business is doing well because she offers good customer service and a good quality product. She is very grateful for the loan because she is able to buy more supplies for the cookies such as flour, eggs, chocolate, sugar, etc. This improvement will enable her to make cookies in large amounts and will increase her income. In the future she wants to add more varieties of cookies to sell and achieve her biggest dream: to ensure her children have a profession and find a good job. Other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as selling snacks, running a grocery store and selling cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as flour, eggs, chocolate, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for more rice, oil, and side dishes to cook and sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for more watches to sell

loans.name: Leonila

texts.es:
Leonila, tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su esposo, no tienen hijos, ella se dedica a la sastrería, tiene 3 años de estar dedicado a esta actividad, su esposo tambien es sastre, juntos atienden la demanda.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la costura como ciper, hilo, broches, telas de diferentes colores, esta compra le ayudara para que el negocio mantenga todo lo necesario y poder continuar realizando los servicios de sastrería.
La aspiración de Leonila es que su taller crezca y atender más clientes, tambien mantener ropa ya confeccionada para la venta y pues todo esto tambien al final quiere contar con su propia casa.
texts.en:
Leonila, 30, lives with her husband; they don’t have children.  She’s a tailor and has been in this line of work for three years.  Her husband is also a tailor and together they meet demand.

She is asking for a loan to buy sewing supplies like zippers, thread, clasps and fabric in assorted colors.  This purchase will help the business have everything it needs and to continue providing tailoring services.  

Leonila’s hope is that her shop grows and to take care of more customers and also to have ready-made clothes to sell and in the end she’d like to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy zippers, thread, clasps and fabric in assorted colors.

loans.name: Deysi

texts.es:
Deysi, vive con su suegra y dos hijos de 15 y 9  años de edad, tambien su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, tiene su negocio en un local del mercado, donde vende los tomates, chiles, cebollas, plátanos, este negocio surgió desde hace 15 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de verduras frescas como tomates, chiles, yuca, repollo, papas y güisquil, este préstamo le dará a Deysi una mejor vistosidad en el negocio,  atender mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
La aspiración de Deysi es que sus hijos se superen, ayudarlos a través de su trabajo diario en el negocio, para que ellos tengan por medio del estudio más oportunidades de desarrollo.
texts.en:
Deysi lives with her mother-in-law and two children who are 15 and 9 years of age and also with her husband.  She sells vegetables.  She has her business in a market stall where she sells tomatoes, chilies, onions and bananas; the business started 15 years ago.

She’s asking for a loan to buy fresh vegetables like tomatoes, chilies, manioc, cabbage, potatoes and chayote.  This loan will make Daysi’s stand more attractive and she’ll be able to better attend to customer needs.

Deysi’s hope is that her children become upstanding citizens, to help them through her daily work in her business so that they will have more opportunities to develop through their schooling.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables.

loans.name: Gustavo Ariel

texts.es: Gustavo es un joven sencillo que para generar ingresos e independizarse económicamente de sus padres tiene la iniciativa de su negocio, cuyo negocio es brindar los servicios de fotocopias en general, gracias a este negocio él puede  liberar a sus padres de una responsabilidad mas y de esa manera ayudar de alguna manera con los gastos de su hogar, emprende esta actividad desde  hace 3 años, inicialmente con el apoyo de su tía quien le facilito el instrumento de su trabajo que es la fotocopiadora, misma que le vendió a crédito y fue cancelando con el mismo trabajo.  Gustavo ve con mucho orgullo esta su herramienta de trabajo, pues es su patrimonio por lo que ahora tiene la gran aspiración de que su pequeño negocio crezca razón por la cual el destino del crédito es para la compra de otro fotocopiadora. Su trabajo es cansador pues está en la atención de su negocio todo el día desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, en algunas horas la madre le reemplaza mientras Gustavo asiste a   sus clases ya que trabaja y estudia. Entre sus metas esta estudiar una carrera profesional y de esa manera tener dos fuentes de ingreso para poder tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Gustavo is a modest young man who decided to start his own photocopy business in order to earn his own money and become independent. Thanks to this business, he has been able to lift one more responsibility off his parents' shoulders, and he can help out with the household expenses. He has been in business for 3 years. He started out thanks to the support of his aunt, who provided him with his work tool, the photocopier, which she sold to him on credit. He was able to pay the debt with the money he earned from the copy services. Gustavo views his work tool with pride because it is one of his assets. He now aspires to expand his small business, which is why he will ultimately purchase another machine with this loan. His work is exhausting because he opens from 8 in the morning until 8 in the evening. His mother takes his place for a few hours so that he can attend school since he works and studies. One of his goals is to earn a degree and obtain two sources of income, thus affording him a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopier.

loans.name: Kefayah

texts.en:
Kefayah is a 34-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Kefayah is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to redecorate her home.

loans.use: to redecorate her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator for the arrangements, a gate for her store, additional signage, equipment and supplies for the arrangements.

loans.name: Juana Nazaria

texts.es:
La señora Juana Nazaria es casada, tienen 53 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 5 hijos, ninguno de ellos estudia, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este negocio haciendo tricotado de hilo y hasta el momento lleva 2 años tejiendo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esp0oso quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

solicita un préstamo que lo9 utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, espera en el futuro contar con 3 telas y mejorar su capital.
texts.en:
Ms. Juana Nazaria is a married 53-year-old woman who never had the opportunity to go to school. She has 5 children, none of whom study, and weaves for a living. She started out by knitting, and has been in business for 2 years. She gets support from her husband, who is also a weaver.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to purchase different types and colors of thread. In the future, she hopes to acquire fabric and to improve her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase thread.

loans.name: El Eden Group

texts.es: Sinónimo de perseverancia es "El Eden", un grupo de mujeres y hombres optimistas y  luchadores. Este grupo lleva ya formado 3 años, con 9 socios que son ejemplo de personas negociantes. La confianza que hay entre ellos no solo transcurre por el tiempo que llevan como grupo, también a su vez son vecinos y viven en la zona del Agustino. Seria grato comentar de cada uno de las integrantes pero faltarían palabras. Por tanto mencionaremos a la señora Marita, una integrante de 47 años de edad separada y madre de 2 hijos. Ella comienza su labor diaria en su hogar, cuida niños hace mas de dos años y ahora se dedicará a la venta de ropa, asi va a poder ahorrar para los gastos de la casa y los estudios de sus hijos en el colegio. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ropa e implementación del mismo en su hogar. 2El Eden" un grupo que con esmero y dedicación saben salir adelante con el paso de cada día.
texts.en:
Synonymous with perseverance is "Eden", an optimistic group of women and men who demonstrate a fighting spirit.  The group has existed three years and has nine members who are quintessential businesspersons.  The trust that exists between them is due not only to the time spent together in the group but also to the fact that they are all neighbors from the Agustino area.  Although it would be gratifying to be able to comment on each member, words are lacking.  

Marita, for example, is a 47-year-old member who is separated and the mother of two children.  She begins her workday at home.  She has been caring for children for more than two years and now sells clothes so that she will be able to save for household expenses and to put her children through school.  With the current loan, she will buy clothes and establish her business in her home.  

Eden's members know that, with care and dedication, they can succeed with each passing day.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Samba

texts.fr: Samba est employé dans une société de la place et perçois un salaire qui n’atteint  même  pas cinquante mille francs CFA. Il est marié et père de famille. Pour pallier et faire fasse aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille, il a besoin d’une autre source de revenu. C’est pourquoi il a pensé ouvrir un atelier de vulgarisateur. Pour cela il sollicite l’appui financier du guichet en y demandant un crédit de cinquante mille francs pour acheter une machine à air. Et dire que si cela fonctionne bien il est prêt à investir  beaucoup d’argent pour  diversifier ses services.
texts.en:
Samba works as an employee in a local company, but his salary does not even reach 50,000 CFA francs.  He is married and has a family.  To cope and provide for his family's daily necessities, he needs another source of income.  This is why he has been thinking of opening a tire repair shop.
To this end, Samba is requesting financial assistance from micro-finance and he is asking for a loan of 50,000 francs for the purchase of an air-powered inner tube machine.
If things work fine, he is ready to invest a lot of money to diversify his services.

loans.use: to buy a vulcanizer (air-powered inner tube machine)

loans.name: Normandina

texts.es:
La señora Normandina tiene 58 años de edad, es viuda y madre de cinco hijos, reside en la Colonia Moncada Lobo en el municipio de Juticalpa y se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano.

Doña Normandina inicio a vender ropa usada hace mas de 10 años, trabaja conjunto a uno de sus hijos y lo hacen de forma ambulante. Todos los dias muy temprano por las mañanas salen a las aldeas mas cercanas a realizar  ventas y luego regresan a casa por las tardes.  Normandina no sufre algún padecimiento grave, gracias a Dios es una persona sana, pero tiene una nieta con problemas en su vista y ya ha sido sometida  a tres operaciones, actualmente la niña perdió  totalmente su vista y no puede ver. 

Doña Normandina solicita este préstamo para comprar varios fardos de ropa usada y así poder seguir teniendo una actividad económica que le permita sostenerse y ayudar a su nietecita con los gastos médicos de su enfermedad.

Su sueño es ver a su nieta recuperada y tener un local propio para ya no andar vendiendo de forma ambulante y exponiéndose a la delincuencia. 

Doña Normandina tiene cuatro ciclos en FAMA y es una clienta muy puntual con los pagos.
texts.en:
Normandina is 58 years old, is widowed, and has five children.  She lives in Colonia Moncada Lobo in the town of Juticalpa and makes a living selling second-hand clothing.

Normandina started selling used clothing more than 10 years ago.  She works as a street vendor with one of her sons.  They go out very early every morning to sell their goods in nearby villages and then return home in the afternoon.  Normandina is a healthy woman and thankfully does not suffer from any serious ailments; however, one of her granddaughters has had problems with her vision and has already undergone three operations.  Normandina’s granddaughter has now completely lost her vision and is unable to see.

Normandina is asking for a loan so she can purchase bundles of used clothing.  This will allow her to stay in business so she can support herself and help her young granddaughter with the medical expenses from her illness.

Normandina’s dream is to see her granddaughter recover, and also to have a fixed location for her business so she won’t have to work as a street vendor and be exposed to crime.

Normandina has had four loans with FAMA and has been very punctual in making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of used clothing.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, atiende el negocio desde las 5:00am a 12:00md, ya que en la tarde atiende los quehaceres del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de verduras frescas tomates, güisquiles, papa, yuca, zanahorias, repollo, esto le ayudara para mantener el negocio surtido y así obtener más ganancias por las ventas. 
La aspiración de María es instalar otra venta de verduras en la casa, para ir superándose en el comercio.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children and her husband. She works selling vegetables and runs the business from 5am until noon, as during the afternoon she attends to her housework.

She is requesting a loan to purchase fresh vegetables such as tomatoes, chayotes, potatoes, yuca, carrots and cabbage. This will help her to keep her business stocked and to earn more profit through her sales.

María's goal is to set up another point of sales for vegetables in her home, so that she can expand her business.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chayotes, potatoes, yuca, carrots and cabbage.

loans.name: Glenda Elizabeth

texts.es:
Glenda, vive en casa propia, tiene 21 años de edad, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 7 meses, ella tiene un año de estar dedicándose a la crianza de pollo, este negocio lo inicio con su esposo para tener una entrada de dinero que ella puede manejar desde el hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de 200 pollos y 14 sacos de concentrado y unas vacunas, todo esto para crecer en la granja y tener los medicamentos necesarios y el alimento, para poder crecer en el negocio.
La aspiración de Glenda es mejorar económicamente con la ayuda de los préstamos para superarse económicamente con su familia.
texts.en: Glenda is 21 years old and lives with her husband and their 7 month old baby in their own house.  For the last year, Glenda has worked raising chickens, a business she started with her husband to generate more income and allow her to work from their home.  Glenda is requesting a loan to purchase 200 chickens, as well as feed and medicine necessary to raise and sell the chickens and grow her business.  Her goal is to use the loans to earn more money and help improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and sacks of chicken feed

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente, tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, quienes estudian y dependen de el, Vicente se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, trabaja todos los días en el mantenimiento de la granja.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprarse cerdos y concentrado, esta compra le ayudara para incrementar la granja y obtener mejores ventas a futuro.
El aspira tener una granja más amplia y con más cerdos, tener también más clientes para mejorar la solvencia económica.
texts.en: Vincente is 51 years old and lives with his wife and their 2 children who attend school and depend on their father for support.  Vincente works raising pigs, a business he works every day to run and maintain.  He is requesting a loan to purchase more pigs as well as pig feed.  This will help him grow his business and increase sales in the future.  Vincente's goal is to have a larger farm with more pigs, and more customers, enabling him to earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Mamadou Fall

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mamadou Fall, âgé de 43 ans, est un commerçant qui exerce le métier depuis 12 ans déjà. Il fait de la vente de produits alimentaires divers. Il se ravitaille dans un marché hebdomadaire ou les denrées sont à des prix abordables. Avec le crédit, il va acheter pour revendre du mil, du tamarin et divers autres produits.
Mamadou Fall est marié et père de 6 enfants dont le plus âgé a 17 ans et le cadet 4 ans. Il s’occupe des besoins familiaux. Le crédit va impacter sur  la situation du client car il va voir son stock augmenter. Comme projet futur : il veut acquérir un taxi pour diversifier son activité et  augmenter ses sources de revenu. Et ce projet, il désire le voir se réaliser avec l’appui des préteurs.
texts.en: Mamadou Fall, age 43, is a shopkeeper who has already been working for 12 years.  He sells various food products.  He gets his supplies in a weekly market where foodstuffs are reasonably priced.  He is going to buy millet, tamarind, and various other products to resell with his loan.  Fall is married and the father of 6 children.  The oldest child is 17 years old and the youngest is 4 years old.  He stays busy with family responsibilities.  The loan will have an impact on the client’s situation, as he will be able to increase his stock.  As a future project, he wants to purchase a taxi to diversify his business and increase his sources of revenue.  He hopes that this project will be completed with lenders' support.

loans.use: To purchase food products to resell (millet, tamarind, nététou [a seasoning])

loans.name: Jhon Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jhon Carlos; el tiene 47 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño del socio es comprarse un carro nuevo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar llantas.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Jhon Carlos, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Jhon Carlos is 47 years old, he lives with his life partner and has 3 children. He alternates his daily chores with his transportation activity, as he owns a car he offers taxi services with. He works from 7 am to 10 pm and thanks to this activity he is able to provide for his children. He dreams of buying himself a new car. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for the maintenance of his car and to buy tires.

He is pleased with the loan and he commits to complying with the repayment of his dues.

loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his car and to buy tires.

loans.name: Ligia Patricia

texts.es: Ligia es una mujer de 35 años y vive en el municipio de San Jacinto, en el departamento de Bolívar, la tierra de las hamacas y artesanías en tejido vertical;  allí se dedica a producir artesanías, oficio que además de conocer por tradición familiar, lo perfeccionó mediante procesos de tecnificación con el “SENA” Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, organización que controla el estado nacional, para el desarrollo educativo de carreras técnicas y tecnológicas, por eso ella conoce no solo las artesanías de su cultura, sino también las de otras regiones del país. Así mismo como es una mujer estudiosa, también aprendió técnicas de mejoramiento de la imagen personal y tiene un salón de belleza; con ello abrió  una sala de juegos y  aprendió a preparara productos de belleza ella misma etc. Desde todos sus frentes activo-productivos, genera ingresos, aplicando técnicas de ventas en cada una de las actividades que sabe desempeñar, por eso se la pasa ganando clientes en uno y otro espacio productivo y su negocio crece cada día mas. Su meta de crecimiento es inagotable por eso se prepara con capacitaciones que le ayuden a agregarle valor a sus tareas rutinarias; su meta mas adelante es perfeccionarse como estilista de belleza y tener un gran negocio de producción y almacén de productos preparados por ella misma. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva,  segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará hilo para elaborar bolsos, mochilas y hamacas, Juegos en CD, e insumos para preparar productos de belleza. Su inversión será exitosa, porque conoce el mercado, la hace sobre pedidos y conoce técnicas y las aplica a sus negocios, tiene un potencial de oferta permanente en cada una de sus actividades productivas con las cuales genera ingresos, para apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 4 a 12 años de edad.
texts.en: Ligia is a 35-year-old woman who lives in San Jacinto, Bolivar, land of hammocks and vertical weaving. There, she makes handicrafts for a living, something that she learned through family tradition but perfected via training from SENA (National Learning Service), which is an organization run by the state for the development of technical jobs. Because of this, she knows about handicrafts from not only her own culture, but also from other regions of the country. She is a very studious person who also learned about cosmetology and opened up a beauty salon. She also opened a game room and learned how to make beauty products herself. From all her proactive fronts, she is generating income, applying the sales techniques she knows how to employ in each of her businesses. For this reason, she has been gaining customers in all her ventures, and business grows ever day. Her goal of business expansion is endless, which is why she prepares herself with the training that helps her add value to her daily tasks. Her future goal is to perfect her stylist skills and to have a big beauty product business in which she will produce the goods herself. She is currently requesting her first loan through Kiva, and this is the second loan she requests from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this loan, she will purchase thread to make bags, backpacks, and hammocks, video games, and supplies to make beauty products. Her investment will be successful because she knows the market well, she fills orders, she knows entrepreneurial techniques, and she applies them to her businesses. She is well-stocked in all of her businesses through which she earns an income to support her household, which is comprised of her husband and her children ages 4 and 12.

loans.use: to purchase video games, supplies to make beauty products, and thread to make bags, backpacks, and hammocks.

loans.name: Serafina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Serafina; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas, chompas y polos, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos, blusas, chompas y pantalones al por mayor.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Serafina, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Serafina is 52 years old, she lives with her life partner and has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity, selling items of clothing such has trousers, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts. She works from 7 am to 6 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to expand her clothes selling activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy polo shirts, blouses, sweaters and trousers at wholesale price.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy polo shirts, blouses, sweaters and trousers at wholesale price.

loans.name: Rosa Judith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa Judith; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Rosa Judith, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Rosa Judith is 46 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her restaurant, preparing and serving breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She works from 8 am to 7 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to improve her restaurant. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy coking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy coking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Guillermina; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas al por mayor.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Guillermina, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Guillermina is 47 years old, she is married and she has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity running her general store. She sells basic necessities such as rice, sugar, milk and oil. She works from 7 am to 6 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to expand her general store. The loan she is requesting will be used to stock up her general store by buying products such as rice, sugar, milk and biscuits at wholesale price.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, milk and biscuits at wholesale price.

loans.name: Katia Vannesa

texts.es: Katia Vanessa, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está en unión libre,  vive con sus  hijos y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito va comprar una motocicleta para que su esposo se desplazarse a su trabajo con menor dificultad. Ella quiere brindarle este medio de trasporte a su esposo pues el lugar donde labora es muy largo de su casa por lo cual debe salir muy de mañana y regresar muy tarde hasta su hogar. Ella también quiere que su esposo con la facilidad de trasporte sea más cumplido con su horario de trabajo pues es muy importante el trabajo para el bienestar de la familia pues es de donde subsiste la familia. Ella quiere que su esposo se desempeñe como un trabajador de muy buenas cualidades y  facilitar el apto del trasporte para ser mejores cada día y un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Katia Vanessa, 25, is in a common-law marriage and lives with her husband and their children, her first priority.  She will use the loan to buy a motorcycle for her husband so he can get to his work easily.  She wants to help him with  this means of transportation since the place where he works is very far from their house and he has to leave very early and come home very late.  She also wants to give him a more reliable means of transportation with his schedule because his work is what the family lives on.  She wants her husband to develop as a well qualified employee so she would like him to have the appropriate transportation so that their lives are better each day with the improvement of the welfare of the family.  This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She hadn’t worked with other financing from state banks in the past but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with the best terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her husband's transportation to work

loans.name: Temur

texts.ru: Темур женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. На протяжении многих лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов и успешно продолжает до сегодняшнего дня, и в дальнейшем хочет расширить его. В основном он выращивает лук и пшеницу. В бизнесе помогает сын, дочь и супруга. Темур хотел бы получить займ в размере 2500 сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и химикатов.
texts.en: Temur is married and has five children. He is a very hardworking and kind man. He has been growing agricultural crops for many years and is successfully continuing to this day and wants to expand it further. He grows mainly onions and wheat. His son, daughter and spouse are helping him in this business. Temur wants to get a loan in the amount of 2,500 somoni to buy mineral fertilizer and chemicals.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Sharofidin

texts.ru: Шарофидин добрый и честный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 7 лет он занимается выращиванием лука, бахчевых и зерновых культур. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Шарофиддин хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и кленки. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sharofidin is a kind and honest man. He is married and is a responsible father of three children. He has been growing onions, melons and cereals for more than seven years. His wife is a homemaker. Sharofidin wants to expand his business so that he can get a good profit. He is asking for a loan with the purpose to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer and film. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married. She has no children yet. She describes herself as honest. She works in a clothing business whereby she makes clothes and sells them. She faces the business challenge of fluctuating prices of clothing materials.

She will be using the loan of KES 20,000 to buy more clothing material for her business. Her dream and hope within the next five years is to run a dress-making school.

loans.use: to buy clothing material for making dresses for selling

loans.name: Los Ángeles De Charlies Group

texts.es:
El grupo los Ángeles de Charlies lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla Vanessa quien se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 6 años. Este negocio lo inicio llevando unos cuantos platos de comida a los trabajadores de la panadería donde trabaja y poco a poco fue creciendo empezó hacer fresco y realizar desayunos. Ella  invertirá en granos básicos, huevos, carne…etc.
Las otras integrantes son Raquel quien vende totillas y tiene una pequeña venta desde hace 10 años y Gloria quien tiene una pulpería hace 3 años.
texts.en:
Los Ángeles de Charlies (Charlie’s Angels) is a group composed of three hard working and resourceful people. Karla Vanessa is one of them, and she has been engaged in selling meals for 6 years. She started this activity by bringing some dishes to the employees of the bakery where she worked; then, little by little her activity grew and she began preparing refreshments and breakfasts. She will invest the loan in the purchase of basic grains, eggs and meat among other products.
The other members of the group are Raquel, who sells tortillas and has been running a small stall for 10 years, and Gloria, who has been running a corner shop for 3 years.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, eggs and meat.

loans.name: Perla Soraya

texts.es: Perla, se acerca a institución a solicitar su primer crédito para comprar mercancía ya  que  ella  tiene  un negocio de  venta de ropa usada, el  cual le permite  salir adelante  día  con día, en  esta  ocasión requiere  de  nuestro  apoyo  ya  que  requiere  realizar  la  compra  de mercancía  para  seguir  trabajando ,  ya  que nos  comenta  que  sus  clientes  han  incrementado  de manera  satisfactoria, ella  se  preocupa  por  brindarles  el excelente servicio  que  la a  caracterizado  por  que   sabe  que  de  esta  manera  hará   crecer  su  negocio  y  podrá  tener  una excelente  estabilidad  económica.
texts.en: Perla has come to our institution to ask for her first loan in order to buy some products for the second-hand clothes shop that she runs and that helps her getting ahead day by day. In this occasion she is asking for our help to buy some products to keep on working: she has told us that there has been a satisfactory increase in the number of her customers, and that she worries about offering them the excellent service she is known for because she knows that in this way she will make her activity grow and she will succeed in reaching an excellent economic stability.

loans.use: To buy used clothes.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda  de 44 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena  con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 3 y 6 años. Aquí tiene un restaurante, que genera ingresos para el apoyo al bienestar de su familia. Ella aprendió las tareas propias de la preparación y manejo de alimentos, cuando trabajó como empleada en un restaurante que tenia su madre en el mercado público. Este mismo lo entregó su madre a ella porque presentó problemas de salud. Con su restaurante ha tenido muchos desafíos que enfrentar, como los momentos en los cuales estuvo la vía para el metro en construcción y sus ventas disminuyeron, por eso debió restructurarlo y ubicarlo en su propia vivienda, En la actualidad su negocio está en crecimiento y cada día aumenta su clientela. Con sus ganancias apoya el gasto familiar al lado de su esposo que es un trabajador independiente estacionario. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con él comprará mesas, sillas plásticas abanicos un congelador, infraestructura con la cual planea mantener a su cliente confortable, para que regrese y se fidelice. Su meta es tener suficiente capital de trabajo permanente para adecuar su negocio y a futuro adquirir su propia casa.  Mientras trabaja para alcanzar sus sueños maneja en su negocio una autonomía del 100% una rentabilidad no menor de un 23,5% y una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 3 días; indicadores financieros desde los cuales se proyecta su crecimiento.
texts.en: Nilda is 44 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena with her partner and her two children ages 3 and 6.  Here she has a restaurant that generates income to support the well-being of the family.  She learned the work of preparing and managing food when she worked as an employee in the restaurant that her mother had in the public market.  That same restaurant was given to Nilda by her mother because her mom began to have health problems.  With her restaurant she has had many challenges that she has had to face, like the times when the metro stop was under construction and her sales went down.  For that reason she had to restructure and locate the business in her own home.  Currently her business is growing and each day her customer base increases.  With her earnings she supports the family expenses along with her husband who is an independent stationary contractor.  Her Kiva credit is the first financing that she has received through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, a Kiva field partner.  With the loan she will purchase tables, plastic chairs, fans, and a freezer.  This infrastructure will help her keep her customers comfortable so that they will return and become faithful clients.  Her goal is to have sufficient capital from permanent work to be able to support her business and in the future buy her own home.  While she works to achieve her dreams she runs her business 100% autonomously, with no less than 23.5% profitability, and with a rotation of bills to be paid of three days.  These are the financial indicators from which she projects her growth.

loans.use: to purchase tables, plastic chairs, fans, and a freezer.

loans.name: Duverlys

texts.es: Duverlys  de 34 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 10 a 12 años. Ella inició desde hace 6 años su experiencia de negocios con su madre, mediante una tienda donde vendía ranchos, víveres, abarrotes  y artículos de la canasta familiar. Ella debió salir con su familia de su vivienda, pues fue desplazada y debió irse a vivir donde su hermana y volvió a iniciar allí su negocio, aunque con unos pocos productos de la canasta familiar,  hace 7 meses; con su persistente trabajo ha logrado avanzar un poco, pero su gran desafío es el capital de trabajo, que se torna insuficiente ante sus planes de crecimiento, pues necesita también ayudar mucho mas a su marido en los gastos de su hogar, quien trabaja en una parcela cultivando y criando animales. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará en mayor cantidad, víveres, abarrotes y productos de dulcería, pues está ubicada frente a un colegio y su sueño es poder vender mucho mas, teniendo en la oferta lo que el cliente realmente necesita, para prosperar y salir adelante con su familia y poder brindarle una buena eduación y bienestar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Duverlys is 34 years old and lives with her husband and their three children, who range in age from 10 to 12.  Her business experience began 6 years ago when she and her mother opened a store that sold groceries and other basic necessities.  However, Duverlys and her family later had to leave their home, since they were displaced and had to go to live with her sister.  She restarted her business 7 months ago, though with only a few basic staple items.  By working persistently she has managed to make some progress, but her biggest challenge is working capital, since she doesn’t have enough for her growth plans.  She also needs more money so she can help her husband with the household expenses; he works farming a parcel of land and raising livestock.  That is why Duverlys has decided to take out a loan.  This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and she will use it to purchase a larger amount of groceries, supplies, and sweets.  Her business is located in front of a school, and she offers her customers items that they really need.  Duverlys’s dream is to sell much more so that her business will prosper and she can get ahead with her family and provide her children with a good education and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a larger amount of groceries, supplies, and sweets.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a 44-year-old carpenter in Mariakani. He is married and a father of five children. His business has successfully been in operation for the past thirteen years. 

This marks his fifth loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. With the loan, he plans to purchase two smoothening planes, one jack plane, screw drivers and a chisel.

He will use the profits to start a poultry-keeping business and repay his loan. He hopes to have a prosperous family and well-educated children.

loans.use: to purchase carpentry tools

loans.name: Adalicia

texts.es:
Adalicia, se dedica a la venta de mariscos y frutas, vive con toda su familia, ella está soltera, el negocio de mariscos nació hace más de 30 años, es un trabajo de familia, por eso mismo ella se dedica a esta actividad pero además quiso ofrecer fruta fresca para diversificar los productos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pescado, camarón, también comprara frutas como manzanas, fresas, peras, uvas, esta compra le ayudara para tener más amplio el negocio.
La aspiración de Adalicia es aumentar en las ventas y con ello poder mejorar los ingresos familiares
texts.en: Adalicia works selling seafood and fruit.  She lives with her family, she is single, and her seafood business began more than 30 years ago.  It is a family business, and for that reason she is dedicated to this activity but she also wanted to offer fresh fruit in order to diversify the products.  She is asking for a loan to purchase fish and shrimp, and she will also by fruits like apples, strawberries, pears, and grapes.  These purchases will help her to increase her business.  Adalicia's aspiration is to increase sales and thereby improve the family income.

loans.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, and fruit.

loans.name: Manuel Israel

texts.es:
Manuel, tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, todos son menores y estudian, él se dedica a una tienda de productos domésticos, trabaja de lunes a domingo, está instalada en su vivienda, su esposa le ayuda a atender el negocio, tiene 20 años de existir.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir el negocio de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, galletas, boquitas, bebidas, entre otras que son de mucha demanda, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el inventario y continuar sirviendo bien.
La aspiración de Manuel es que su negocio prospere, a través de este préstamo, mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Manuel is 46 years old and lives with his wife and his three children, all of whom are young and still in school.  He dedicates himself to a store that sells  household products.  He works from Monday through Sunday.  The business is in his home and his wife helps him with the business.  It has been in place for 20 years.  He is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise in order to stock the business with rice, sugar, beans, oil, crackers, snacks, drinks, and other things that are in great demand.  This loan will help him to improve his inventory and continue serving his customers well.  Manuel's aspiration is that his business will prosper, improving the quality of his family's life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, beans, oil, crackers, snacks, and drinks

loans.name: Abdurahaman

texts.en:
Abdurahaman is a 30-year-old businessman who sells coconuts in Kilifi. He is married and a father of six children. He has been doing this business for the last twelve years with great success. 

This is his second business loan from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase more coconuts to sell to his customers. He will use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and educate his children.
 
He hopes to have an expanded, well-known business.

loans.use: to purchase more coconuts for sale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 52-year-old widowed woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 15 years to 32 years. She describes herself to be a religious woman. 

Rose operates a grocery store where she sells items such as bananas, onions, and tomatoes. In addition, she also provides rental house services. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a viable area and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds to improve the grocery store. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to pay for the renovation of the rental houses. Rose's dream and business goal is to own another rental house within 5 years.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of rental houses

loans.name: Manuela Ramos Group

texts.es: La Srta. Olinda tiene 21 años de edad,  es soltera  actualmente es socia en la alcancía comunal “Manuela Ramos” grupo  conformado por  9 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Olinda  trabaja los fines de semana de mesera en un restaurante y a  su vez estudia Computacion. Olinda solicito el prestamo para comprar sillas y carpetas para empezar a dar clases de computacion , olinda espera que este nuevo negocio cresca con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacion. Olinda lograra todas sus metas y  sabe que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Olinda is 21 years old, she is single and she is a member of “Manuela Ramos”, a Community Bank composed of 9 members who engage in different retailing activities. Olinda works every week-end as waitress in a restaurant, and she studies computer sciences. Olinda is requesting a loan to buy chairs and desks to start teaching Computer classes: she hopes this new activity will grow thanks to her great effort and serious dedication. Olinda will reach all of her goals, and she knows that the loans from Edaprospo will help her achieving them.

loans.use: To buy chairs and desks.

loans.name: Yanira Lissete

texts.es:
Yanira, vive con su hija en casa propia, ella es comerciante administrando un negocio de variedades, ofrece ropa, sandalias, carteras, el negocio lo inicio hace tres años con el apoyo de su familia.
Ella necesita comprar mercadería para surtir su negocio y comprar artículos que más solicitan sus clientes como: carteras, cinchos, zapatos, ropa para damas y caballeros, de esa forma lograra tener variedad.
El sueño de Yanira es siempre mantener su negocio estable y surtido para darles una mejor atención a sus clientes y sobre todo ayudar con los gastos de la casa y a su hija en el estudio.
texts.en:
Yanira lives with her daughter in her own house.  She works as a vendor and has a varieties shop where she sells clothing, sandals, and handbags.  She started her business three years ago with support from her family.

Yanira needs to purchase merchandise so she can restock her business and purchase items that are most in demand from her customers, such as handbags, belts, shoes, and men and women’s clothing.  She will be able to offer greater variety with these items.

Yanira’s dream is to keep her business stable and well-stocked so she can provide her customers with better service.  Most of all, she wants to meet the household expenses and help her daughter with her studies.

loans.use: to purchase handbags, belts, shoes, and men and women’s clothing.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas frescas, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, la vivienda es propia, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado, un lugar fijo y accesible para los clientes, tiene 10 años de estar en este lugar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas como manzanas, bananos, papayas, ciruelas, y el rento en verduras como güisquiles, repollo, papas, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el inventario, manteniendo de frutos frescos.
Ella aspira crecer en el negocio, construir a futuro una casa para sus hijos, espera lograrlo a través del buen uso de los financiamientos.
texts.en: María works selling vegetables and fresh fruit.  She lives with her husband and three children.  The house is her own.  She has the business in the market, a stable location and accessible to the customers.  She has been in that location for 10 years.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase fruits like apples, bananas, papaya, plums, and the rest to purchase vegetables like chayote, cabbage, and potatoes.  This loan will help her to improve her inventory, maintaining fresh fruit.  She hopes to grow the business, to construct in the future a house for her children.  She is hoping to achieve this through the good use of loans.

loans.use: To purchase fruit like apples, bananas, papaya, and plums.

loans.name: Silvia Daniela

texts.es:
Silvia, es soltera, ella se dedica a  la fabricación de pan dulce y pan francés desde hace 3 años el cual lo aprendió de su abuela juntas se dedican al mismo negocio todos los días de la semana.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar los materiales para elaborar el pan como: harina, manteca y azúcar, de esa forma lograra aumentar en su produccion y ventas.
El objetivo de Silvia es siempre mantener estable su negocio, cubrir varios lugares en tiendas para repartir el pan y lograr estudiar en la universidad para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Silvia is single and has made sweet bread and French bread for 3 years. She learned from her grandmother and together they work at the same business every day of the week. 

She needs the loan to buy the ingredients to make the bread, such as: flour, lard and sugar and thus increase her production and sales. Silvia's objective is always to maintain a stable business, cover various stores to deliver her bread and go to the university to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard and sugar.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella es comerciante de ropa, vende desde hace 10 años, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado en una zona accesible y de la cual ya tienen conocimiento muchos clientes, en el negocio ofrece prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva, blusas, camisas formales, vestidos, ropa interior, que le ayude a crecer en la venta, ofreciendo nuevos estilos.
La aspiración de María es que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios, para que tengan mejores oportunidades de superación.
texts.en: María lives with her husband and their two children.  She is a clothing salesperson and has been selling for the past 10 years.  She has her business in the market of an accessible zone and in that area she knows many of the clients.  In the business she offers clothing for women, men and children.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase new clothes, blouses, dress shirts, dresses, and underwear, which will help her increase sales by offering new styles.  María's aspiration is that her children will be able to finish their studies so that they can have better opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: To purchase new clothes, blouses, dress shirts, and dresses.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 4 años de edad, tiene un taller de estructuras metálicas, trabaja de lunes a viernes, sus trabajos son por contrato, el horario es de 7:00am en delante.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de puertas, ventanas y balcones, como hierro de diferentes medidas, láminas, pintura y lijas, con estos materiales estará preparado para realizar el trabajo de los clientes. 
La aspiración de Leonardo es tener un taller más amplio, hacerse de herramientas más nuevas y prácticas, tambien quiere prosperar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo lives with his wife and 4 year old son. He has a metallic structure workshop. He works Monday through Friday and works by contract. His schedule is from 7:00 a.m. on.
